verses.verse: (A Psalm for Thanksgiving.) Shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with gladness; <S%H8057><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him with joyful <S%H7445><s%> singing. <S%H7445><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Himself <S%H1931><s%> is God; <S%H430><s%> It is He who has made <S%H6213><s%> us, and not we ourselves; <S%H587><s%> [We are] His people <S%H5971><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of His pasture. <S%H4830><s%>

Enter <S%H935><s%> His gates <S%H8179><s%> with thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> [And] His courts <S%H2691><s%> with praise. <S%H8416><s%> Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Him; bless <S%H1288><s%> His name. <S%H8034><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%> And His faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
